name: WAV
tag_list: wireless, wan, lan, isp, wisp, distributor, security, rfid, voip, portable-data-collection
overview: WAV is a Value-Added, Wireless Broadband Distributor. WAV Distribution helps VARs, ISPs and WISPs profit in the Wireless, Security, RFID, VoIP and Portable Data-Collection Marketplace. WAV sells broadband wireless point-to-point and point-to-multipoint, LAN/WANs, WiMAX and Wi-Fi to VARs, ISPs & WISPs.
